title: Define Comprehensive Requirements for Autonomous Vehicle Fleet
description: Gather and document extensive requirements for the autonomous vehicle fleet, covering vehicle specifications (e.g., sensors, actuators, power systems), operational scenarios (e.g., urban traffic, off-road conditions), safety standards (e.g., ISO 26262, UNECE R157, IEC 61508), regulatory compliance (e.g., NHTSA, EU regulations, UN Regulation No. 79), future scalability considerations (e.g., fleet size management, software updates and versioning strategies), interoperability with existing transportation infrastructure (e.g., traffic signals, parking systems), and potential research areas that could enhance the system's performance and user experience. Recommendations should include feasible solutions for each requirement, considering factors such as cost, development time, and impact on overall system architecture.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for vehicle control, route planning, fleet management, and infrastructure integration.

title: Develop Vehicle Control System
description: Implement the software for autonomous vehicle control, including perception, decision-making, and actuation modules.

title: Implement Route Planning and Optimization
description: Develop algorithms and software for efficient route planning and optimization, considering traffic conditions, passenger demand, and vehicle availability.

title: Build Fleet Management System
description: Create a system for managing the autonomous vehicle fleet, including vehicle monitoring, maintenance scheduling, and dispatching.

title: Develop User Interface and Mobile App
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface and mobile application for passengers to request rides and track vehicle status.

title: Integrate with Urban Infrastructure
description: Develop interfaces and protocols for integrating the autonomous vehicle fleet with urban infrastructure, such as traffic signals and smart city systems.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Develop Testing and Validation Framework
description: Create a comprehensive testing and validation framework for the autonomous vehicle fleet, including simulation environments, test scenarios, and performance metrics.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for system administrators, operators, and end-users.
